tammirinnes@gmail com tammirinne bind off keep the needles side by side on your left hand yarn comes out from the needle back cut off the yarn about 7 9 / 20 cm away from the work so there is enough for binding off insert the yarn end to a tapestry needle there are no set up sts in this pattern 1 bring the yarn through the first stitch on the front needle from left as to knit drop the stitch knit drop 2 bring the yarn through the second stitch on the front needle from right as to purl leave the stitch on the needle purl leave 3 bring the yarn through the first stitch on the back needle from right as to purl drop the stitch purl drop 4 bring the yarn through the second stitch on the back needle from left as to knit knit leave repeat points 1 to 4 until you have two
